title: [COMPLETE] Scheduled Maintenance - Patch 5.14 - 23/07/2015
body:
**Update - July 23:** This was completed earlier this morning, next time you login you will begin patching 5.14.


On 23/07/15, starting at 02:30 Sydney Time (16:30 UTC), ranked queues will be disabled in preparation for patch 5.14. At 04:00 Australian Eastern Standard Time (18:00 UTC), the servers will be shut down and all games currently in progress will end in a draw and stats will not be recorded. We estimate the battlegrounds will be unavailable for 3 hours.

replies.body: Hey i have a mac and the patch seemed to download ok for me this morning however as soon as i get to loading screen the screen stays black and when i try to exit and reconnect it just stays black. How do i fix this? my LOL client worked fine before the patch. :(

> [{quoted}](name=Blackyyy,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=5nuE1E6K,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-23T01:53:56.969+0000)
>
> Hey i have a mac and the patch seemed to download ok for me this morning however as soon as i get to loading screen the screen stays black and when i try to exit and reconnect it just stays black. How do i fix this? my LOL client worked fine before the patch. :(

Sorry to hear you are having issues with the latest patch. We are keeping a close eye on a the reddit bugs megathread, where others have shared similar experiences. https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/3e63b9/514_patch_bugs_megathread/

Our team is aware that Mac is seeing some instability issues and digging in now. I don't have any timelines at this point, but wanted you to know that we are looking into it at this time.

Just wanted to say thanks for the acknowledgement. I get that there would be lots of pressure on everyone at this point and me and the majority of people who appreciate your efforts are thankful. The fact that you took the time to respond to me shows that you have time for your players so thanks again!!
